articles.title: US police arrests woman for assault on Indian Americans: 'I hate you Indians…' - The Indian Express
articles.description: The video has now gone viral and sent shock waves among the Indian-American community across the United States.
articles.content: Police in Texas on Thursday arrested a person after a video of her assaulting a group of four Indian-American women surfaced and went viral in which she is abusing them and asking them to go back to … [+2258 chars]

articles.title: WHO reports 21% decline in monkeypox cases globally, but US still seeing spike - CNA
articles.description: The WHO said the number of global monkeypox cases fell by more than 20% last week. While infections in Europe dropped, the US and Latin America are still see...
